info.name: Delta Share - Metrics API
info.description: API collection for extracting Databricks pipeline and job run metrics

query.description: Optional ISO timestamp (e.g., 2024-01-23T10:30:00Z). Returns runs from this timestamp onwards. If empty, returns all runs.

request.description:
Extract pipeline run metrics. Returns pipeline info, run details, timing, and error messages.

Response 200: pipeline_name, pipeline_id, total_runs, runs array
Response 400: Invalid timestamp
Response 404: Pipeline not found

item.name: Get Pipeline Run Metrics (With Timestamp Filter)

query.description: ISO timestamp - returns runs from this timestamp onwards

request.description:
Extract pipeline run metrics filtered by start timestamp. Returns only runs after the specified timestamp.

Each run includes: update_id, run_status, start_time, end_time, duration_seconds

query.description: Optional ISO timestamp. Returns job runs from this timestamp onwards. If empty, returns all runs.

request.description:
Extract job run metrics for all jobs associated with a pipeline.

Returns: job_name, pipeline info, job_id, run_id, run_by, timing, schedule, status, error_message

Response 200: pipeline_name, pipeline_id, total_runs, runs array
Response 400: Invalid timestamp
Response 404: Pipeline not found

item.name: Get Job Run Metrics (With Timestamp Filter)

query.description: ISO timestamp - returns job runs from this timestamp onwards

request.description:
Extract job run metrics filtered by start timestamp. Returns only job runs after the specified timestamp.

Each run includes: job_name, job_id, run_id, run_by, start_time, end_time, duration_seconds, job_schedule, run_status, result_state, error_message
